dc_title_s: Map of the lower portion of the Sandusky River Basin showing availability of underground water
dc_description_s: Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of rocks in the Lower portion of the Sandusky River Basin and the quality of underground water.|"Prepared by RUSSELL B. STEIN, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water"|Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.|Scale bar lower right corner.
